head.supplied: 3.3.81 ¶ My dear Baron Müeller, ¶ ¶ I enclose plans asked [for] and beg to return many [thank]s for the circular from F. W. [Bre]ithaupt & Sohn, with whom I shall take an early opportunity of communi...

div.p: GRG 35/20/45, outward letterpress copy book, p. 946, Department of Lands, State Records of South Australia, Adelaide.

I enclose plans asked [for] and beg to return many [thank]s for the circular from F. W. [Bre]ithaupt & Sohn, with whom I shall take an early opportunity of communicating on the subject of the instruments in question.
I hope your conjectures respecting Skulthorpe may be realized. —
